name: frappe-apps-manager
description: Comprehensive Frappe Framework development and management tools for building, deploying, and maintaining Frappe applications with complete SDLC coverage

changes: Added 5 new commands: frappe-new-site, frappe-test, frappe-logs, frappe-console, frappe-cache, frappe-role-manager, frappe-config, frappe-db-reset
Added 7 new agents: frappe-tester, frappe-security, frappe-devops, frappe-performance, frappe-integration, frappe-data-engineer, frappe-ui-ux

Added 12 new skills: client-script-generator, unit-test-generator, workflow-generator, webhook-manager, external-api-connector, data-migration-generator, fixture-creator, performance-optimizer, web-form-builder, documentation-generator, integration-test-generator, state-machine-helper
Added frappe-commit output style for conventional commits
Enhanced hooks with test reminders, cache suggestions, and environment validation
Improved all components with core app references and real ERPNext patterns
Initial release with 7 commands, 3 agents, 3 skills
